name: pnp-replace-membership-of-selected-groups
title: CLI - Replace a user's membership in selected Microsoft 365 Groups or Teams
shortDescription: This script can be used to replace the membership of a user for a selected list of Groups.
longDescription: This script can be used to replace the membership of a user for a selected list of Groups. It might be useful when a person changes role in an organization or is about to leave it.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
